definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 這個風景英俊山區和上莊儲藏着很多溫泉。

sentences.english: He is a handsome man with devilish charm.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個英俊瀟灑有着魔鬼般魅力的男人。

sentences.english: Are extremely handsome men really more likely to be gay?
sentences.chinese: 非常英俊的男人真的更可能是同性戀嗎？

sentences.english: He is both handsome and rich.
Hemingway was as handsome as a film star , Bogart as sophisticated as a writer .
sentences.chinese: 海明威英俊好比影星，而鮑嘉睿智有如作家。

sentences.english: He is not only handsome but also clever.
sentences.chinese: 他不僅英俊瀟灑，而且聰明。

sentences.english: The beautiful lady smiles and waves her hand to the handsome guy.
sentences.chinese: 這位漂亮的女士笑着朝這個英俊的小夥子招了招手。

sentences.english: Very soon, in came an enchantingly handsome young man.
sentences.chinese: 一位迷人的英俊男子進來了。

sentences.english: She makes eyes at all handsome men.
sentences.chinese: 她對所有英俊的男士大送秋波。

sentences.english: You are such a handsome man I have ever seen in my life.
sentences.chinese: 你是我這一輩子見過的最英俊瀟灑的男人。

sentences.english: This was because Edward thought that to be his best side.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲他認爲左臉最英俊。

sentences.english: Fine clothes added to his strikingly handsome appearance.
sentences.chinese: 華麗的服裝使他那極其英俊的外貌更爲出色。

sentences.english: My ex-boyfriend is tall and handsome like him.
sentences.chinese: 我的前男友就像他一樣高大英俊。

sentences.english: A:Tony looks very handsome in the suit.
sentences.chinese: 託尼穿那件衣服很英俊。

sentences.english: Yes, Garrick was a handsome boy.
sentences.chinese: 是的，傑是位英俊的男孩。

sentences.english: As far as I can remember, he was tall and handsome.
sentences.chinese: 就我能記起來的，他又高又英俊。

definition: variant of 氣宇軒昂|气宇轩昂[qi4 yu3 xuan1 ang2]
to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
